titleStmt.title: Texeda retextus: or The Spanish monke his bill of diuorce against the Church of Rome together with other remarkable occurrances.
Hispanus conversus. English
titleStmt.author: Tejeda, Fernando de, fl. 1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] for Robert Mylbourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the great south dore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Tejeda, Fernando de. Hispanus conversus.
Running title reads: The Spanish monkes conuersion.
"To the Christian reader" signed "Daniel Featly". Variant: signed "D.F.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south dore of Pauls
